properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWnUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT N.NOTI_NO , N.TITLE , N.ENROLL_DATE , M.MEM_ID , NOTI_VIEWS FROM NOTICE N JOIN MEMBER M ON(M.MEM_NO = N.MEM_NO) ORDER BY NOTI_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_CATEGORY , FAQ_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , FAQ_VIEWS FROM FAQ ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWnUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT MTM_NO , MEM_NO , MTM_TYPE , MTM_TITLE , ENROLL_DATE , MEM_NO2 , ANS_YN FROM MTM ORDER BY MTM_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
